author: jvanzyl
msg: o trying method number two which is to push a new resources element into the POM and name it with a convention so that
other archivers can pick it up. Not as general a solution but works for licensing.
what i see would be nice here is if a Resource had an ID and that would make these convention driven process far
more workable. i'm just looking for a "standard" directory name and adding that to archives if found.
